mean_en: the act or process of persuading someone forcefully to do something that they do not want to do
word_etyma: coerc强制+ion名词后缀 → 强制；强迫；高压政治；威压
short_phrase: use coercion to make the girl behave
sentence: When I was a kid mom always had to use coercion to get me to do my chores.
sentence_trans: 小时候妈妈经常需要使用高压政策来逼我干家务。
